snippet.title: Narcosis Trailer 3: "#Safe+Dry"
snippet.description:
Narcosis ships on Steam, Oculus and Xbox One March 28, 2017.
(more below...)
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/366870
Facebook/Twitter: @narcosisgame

Survival, horror at the sunless depths of the Pacific: Stranded on the seafloor with low light and few tools, an industrial diver takes desperate steps to surface before his dwindling oxygen — and sanity — give out.

First conceived as a student project, this first person survival story unfolds from inside a “walking coffin” —   a half-ton, high-tech deep-sea dive suit — following an industrial catastrophe. Influenced and inspired by a growing appetite for unconventional horror and narrative-driven games, Narcosis is rooted in reality, but steeped in the surreal.
